title: About Milvus Bootcamp
description:
Milvus is a powerful, open-source vector database built for high performance and scalability, effortlessly handling billions of vector representations from unstructured data. It runs seamlessly across any setup, from laptops to expansive distributed systems.

The Milvus Bootcamp is your hands-on journey to mastering these capabilities, with step-by-step tutorials and practical exercises to equip you with the skills to create AI-driven applications like Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), multimodal search, and recommendation engines. Dive into our bootcamp tutorials today and start building impactful AI applications with confidence and ease!

content.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
content.desc: Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using Milvus for efficient document retrieval and LLM for text generation based on retrieved context.

content.title: Multimodal RAG
content.desc: Demonstrate a multimodal RAG system using Milvus, a visualized BGE model, and GPT-4o to perform image retrieval based on text instructions and image queries.

content.title: Graph RAG
content.desc: Demonstrate a Graph RAG approach using Milvus, combining entity and relation retrieval with LLM reranking to improve multi-hop question answering performance.

content.title: Hybrid Search
content.desc: Perform hybrid search using dense and sparse vectors in Milvus, combining semantic and keyword-based search for improved relevance in information retrieval.

content.title: Image Similarity Search
content.desc: Demonstrate how to use Milvus for image similarity search by extracting features from images using a ResNet model, indexing them in Milvus, and performing an image search.

content.title: Recommender System
content.desc: Build a movie recommendation system utilizing Milvus. This includes generating and loading embeddings of movie descriptions and enabling querying with filters.

content.title: Video Similarity Search
content.desc: Learn to build a semantic video search application by integrating Twelve Labs' Embed API for multimodal embeddings with Milvus vector database.

content.title: Audio Similarity Search
content.desc: Help you to build an audio fingerprinting detection system using Milvus, which is a technique for identifying similar audio clips.

content.title: Molecular Similarity Search
content.desc: Build a molecule similarity search system using Milvus paired with RDkit for cheminformatics.
